OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.jobId: ID of the job to confirm
ID of the job to dispute

expireJob(bytes32).details: Anyone can call this after the timeout period

params.jobId: ID of the job to expire

returns._0: True if job can be expired

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.callerAgentId: ID of the calling agent (0 if human caller)
params.providerAgentId: ID of the agent providing the service

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

confirmJob(bytes32).notice: Confirm job completion (releases MNEE to provider wallet)

constructor.notice: Initialize the router with registry and escrow addresses

disputeJob(bytes32).notice: Dispute a job (refunds MNEE to caller)

expireJob(bytes32).notice: Expire a job after timeout (releases MNEE to provider wallet)

isJobExpired(bytes32).notice: Check if a job is expired

requestService(uint256,uint256).notice: Request a service from an agent (locks MNEE in escrow)

userdoc.notice: Main entry point for the AgentPay protocol
